website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy block or pair of blocks in high-density EVA foam with beveled edges.
pros: Either 1 or 2 yoga blocks in a choice of 6 colors and 2 sizes
This standard block of high-density EVA foam that features beveled edges and non-toxic materials with a non-slip surface, with an alternate 3" model if you don’t need as much lift
Perfect blend of firm and grip
Can order 1 big or 2 smaller ones as a set

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, love the color
customer_reviews.text: No chemical smells! Yay! Great quality, love the color. The only thing I don't like about the blocks is that they are 9x6x4. I thought this was standard size when I ordered (& the same size as what I use in Iyengar yoga). However, I later discovered that the blocks we use in yoga class are actually 9x6x3. They are smaller & easier to use, turn & grip with my small hands. Unfortunately, I wasn't able to find the smaller 9x6x3 size made by Reehut on amazon. So I ordered from a different seller.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: I love these yoga blocks and I think the quality is ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I love these yoga blocks and I think the quality is mostly fantastic. My only frustration with them is that I wish they were a bit stronger. When I'm lying on my back, balancing a block at its highest level to stretch my sacrum, it bends a bit underneath the full weight of my body (118 lbs.), which interrupts the posture and leads to readjustments that shouldn't be necessary. For beginner yogis who are using these as a balancing aide-- I give these 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Tayler L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheap yoga blocks
customer_reviews.text: Well they're yoga blocks, blocky and for yoga, and they do their thing at a lower price than you'd get from name brands, so i'm very happy with them. The foam is rather silky-soft to the touch, not to hard, but firm enough to use for their purpose. They had a funny but not gross smell when they arrived but it has faded.
customer_reviews.author: wildebeest

customer_reviews.title: I love my yoga block
customer_reviews.text: I love my yoga block!! It's super lightweight and very sturdy! I've been using it since moment I got it. I like the fact I can just throw it in my gym bag and go! No more using someone else's yoga block!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda D

customer_reviews.title: Solid product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginning yoga student and these blocks are great. Wonderful color choices, and you can stand on these, which leaves the marks of non-skid socks, but a few minutes later, the marks have disappeared, so very resilient!
customer_reviews.author: Creature Comforts

customer_reviews.title: Great for use as desktop speaker stands!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely perfect for my need. I don't use them for yoga, but as desktop speaker stands to elevate and isolate my monitor speakers in my home recording studio. Great and well made blocks, and while I'm sure they work great for yoga, I highly recommend them as speaker stands at a TINY fraction of the cost of so called "real desktop stands". Believe me, these work just as well, if not better.
customer_reviews.author: sunesisTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great blocks.
customer_reviews.text: These are great yoga blocks, and they have a variety of uses. While I haven't used them for yoga, I bought a pair in black so I could raise my speakers off the desk (see photo) and they work perfectly! Mine had no smell when they first arrived, contrary to some other reviewers' experiences. These blocks come in two sizes - 9x6x4 and 9x6x3. I purchased the 9x6x4 version for the extra inch of height, but take note of which size you are purchasing to make sure you receive the correct dimensions for your needs. The quality of this product is good - I will be purchasing a set in purple for exercise. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Warning: THEY SHOW TWO BUT IT IS ONE!! beware..
customer_reviews.text: its an ok price and cheap good block BUT it isnt a pair, like shown. i had to reorder, and buying them two IS an option. just don't think this is a SET of blocks. just the one, not very useful. but this is the SECOND one i purchased so all is well now.
customer_reviews.author: nr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Perfection! I got these for my husband, the tin man, and he's actually using them! They travel very well and he's been taking them to the gym to use after his morning workout group- the assistance and stability these blocks offer has been a game changer for him. He is an almost 300lb, former All-American football player and these blocks are holding up fantastically and don't give or distort even when he's putting a lot of pressure on them. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: SoDak

customer_reviews.title: Not just for Yoga
customer_reviews.text: In the process of reorganizing my room, I discovered that all my large furniture pieces would be in front of the wall outlets. Originally, I thought that wood blocks would do the trick. So, I started out with two 2"x6"x4" blocks that I got from Michael's, but grew concerned over their ability to stand up and not fall over and would they damage the wood flooring, wall, or baseboard. I began searching again and found these Yoga blocks; wide, soft, and sturdy. They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: amvandy

customer_reviews.title: Poor shipping and unable to exchange damaged item.
customer_reviews.text: Received block that was damaged. Tried to return for exchange and unable to do so. Be careful when you purchase these. Sadly disappointed. Poor customer support.
customer_reviews.author: RN1974

customer_reviews.title: Bright, light and a present to myself
customer_reviews.text: Sheltering at home Has turned into an opportunity to participate with my favorite Yoga instructors whose studios are now “on line.” Two classes with my old wooden blocks was enough to make me go on line. Reehut’s blocks looked good and the price was well within my budget. The bright pink blocks are perfect. Whether I’m placing my hands, head or tailbone on them they stay on my mat and give me the support I need. IT took Longer than usual to get them on Prime but these are extraordinary times and these block we’re finally a present for myself. A gift to allow my Yoga practice to become more meditative and healthful.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta S. Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Practical, But Not So Durable
customer_reviews.text: These yoga blocks are great for the price. I love the color and the fact that they are so lightweight, so that makes them very easy to carry around. The only issue is that (because they are not dense) they can easily be perforated, scratched or ripped. But if you make sure not to let them get near pointy objects all is fine. I travel frequently, so I prefer something lightweight and Reehut yoga blocks suited me well. But if someone is looking for yoga blocks to be used heavily (e.g. physical therapist) or for something more durable, maybe another product is in order.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina D

customer_reviews.title: bad chemical smell and horrible return policy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! Bad chemical smell and when I returned them- they charged me $5.00 What a ripoff! Stay away from these products!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paulie

customer_reviews.title: Love this yoga block
customer_reviews.text: This block is great for modifying yoga poses! It's light weight and easy to use. I am so glad that I purchased this. It helps me get into poses that I couldn't before. It's very useful in my yoga practice.
customer_reviews.author: Janet J.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty enthusiastic about yoga. I purchased these to use for specific poses that consist of me putting my hands on them and then placing all of my weight on them. They were basically one step up from the foam that comes in a packaged box. The blocks would have been fine for resting your head on or to place under your lower back. They did arrive in a prompt fashion and the packaging was fine. I will be returning these and looking for others that have a little more density to them.
customer_reviews.author: Coco Parra

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fantastic deal for someone who is just starting out yoga and is interested in trying out blocks. Two of them for this price is a wild good deal! The main reason I am deducting a star is because I feel like they're a little on the smaller side. They're still totally usable, just not as big as many of the yoga instructors I've seen on YouTube use, so it makes practice a little different.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Hall

customer_reviews.title: Soft touch
customer_reviews.text: This helps with weak wrists and limited range of motion in yoga. Why? It has a bit of cush to the touch so your hands lightly sink in - relieves pressure on hands, but are stable and the support is solid. It has helped expand my range of motion by helping me reach graduated levels of deepness without injury. Cheaper ones are rock hand and can harm the wrist or jam it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods
customer_reviews.text: So I'll start off by saying, I bought these to carve for cosplay, so the damage doesn't actually affect me. This is if I were to use these in a standard way. The box wasn't damaged or open in any way, and it wasn't shipped with anything that would have caused this. Like I said, I'm carving these, but it's still never cool to receive something that's damaged no matter what it's being used for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: While I like these blocks
customer_reviews.text: While I like these blocks, they were ordered April 26 but did not arrive until May 4. Not exactly two-day shipping. I had wanted them to teach a yoga class, but they did not arrive in time. Other than the slow delivery, these are typical blocks for yoga and I like the firmness--not too firm if using for restorative but firm enough for support. Also, like the color options.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Baker

customer_reviews.title: Complete Garbage!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These scratch and mark up so easy. I owned them for 5 mins and they look like complete garbage! I like to keep my stuff looking brand new, even just unwrapping these scratched them up. You barely touch them and they mark. They don’t hold any pressure, minor stretch moves and they indent. COMPLETELY DISAPPOINTED!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Can't really argue with the price and these are fantastic for my wife and I both. Since she is much more flexible, she can lay the block down so it's lower than if you stand the block up on one of the two sides.. of course I use the higher sides but it's great we can share these and with three different sides, really helps us try new exercises without hurting ourselves!
customer_reviews.author: JKinGA

customer_reviews.title: This is my first pair of yoga blocks and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of yoga blocks and I think to myself "why didn't I get them sooner!?" They really do help out when in certain yoga positions. I always was the one who would use a pillow or book to help give me some extra length when stretching and it still never helped all that well. What a game changer these are to my yoga practice especially on days my muscles are tight.
customer_reviews.author: Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Bad condition
customer_reviews.text: I just opened them and both are in bad condition. Very unhappy with how bad these look and one already has a chunk of foam coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to using these, but unfortunately one arrived damaged. As shown in the pictures there is a gash on one of them. The gash is deep and almost half the height of the block, and weakens that area. I would not feel comfortable putting too much weight on it. They actually feel pretty sturdy and light otherwise, but now I can only use one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid blocks that are lightweight yet durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sister and she has used them for several days at this point. They are roughly the size of a tissue box and hold up well to all the pressure put upon them. They have good slip resistance and only a faint smell to them that is only noticeable if you put it up to your nose. Very light scuff marks will show up but it is nothing distracting nor unsightly. There are no cons so far as I can tell and I would recommend to anybody looking to improve their yoga routines.
customer_reviews.author: Totally Biased Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these blocks!! Awesome for the price. They are very sturdy but at the same time, soft enough to do things like fish pose with no discomfort. They are super light weight. They do occasionally get scuffs (if my kids are playing too rough with them) but it hasn’t impacted the integrity of the block. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Captain Meatball

customer_reviews.title: Excellent feel
customer_reviews.text: Used these under my Handcycle to stabilize it while on the trainer. Works excellent and is soft on my frame.
customer_reviews.author: Paraplegic dude

customer_reviews.title: Good price, does the job
customer_reviews.text: These are a little lighter than some foam blocks, but unless you need the weight, these work perfectly well. You can also use them as foot support at a desk or anywhere you need an unobtrusive footrest, especially for one foot. If you are creative you'll come up for other uses for these blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Great foam yoga blocks in a lovely color
customer_reviews.text: I bought these foam yoga blocks after trying out some cork ones that were just too hard. Both worked for poses where you put your hands on them. However, if you sit on yoga blocks this is a better type to get because it has a smidge of give which makes all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: K 8910

customer_reviews.title: Dog grooming aid
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a dog grooming aid. There’s a much more expensive patented product out there that is a better shape for this purpose, but I can’t afford it and this does a pretty good job.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than a Squatty Potty
customer_reviews.text: I have pelvic floor dysfunction so my physical therapist recommended that I use a Squatty Potty or something similar for when I use the bathroom. I learned that yoga blocks work pretty well for that purpose so I bought two and I keep one in my bathroom. For me it seems to work just as well as a Squatty Potty but it's less expensive and takes up less space.
customer_reviews.author: Arach

customer_reviews.title: Double check your order before you send it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for yoga, good quality product and I've already used it once. You'll definitely want to pay attention when you order the picture shows two but you have a choice between ordering one big one or two little ones. I made the mistake of not paying close enough attention to that I wanted to I got one.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Bricks
customer_reviews.text: These yoga bricks where the best priced and value, I found. The design is great, the beveled edges make it comfy to use - the material density is high enough to make them stable - but not so hard that they hurt and not so flimsy that they give under your weight. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: They really are affordable, foam yoga blocks. They do mar easily, fingernails or car keys if your bag is sloppy, more than I'd expected. But overall, not too shabby. I keep one at home and one at the office as I never use two at once, so I don't cart them around. Not much else to say about them.
customer_reviews.author: ejw2010

customer_reviews.title: Great Blocks
customer_reviews.text: They are sturdy and light weight, I have stood on them and used them for all kinds of yoga things and I am not a little person by any means! The only thing they did not stand up to is my 3 year old niece taking a bite out of one, but hey it still works for me!
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good color
customer_reviews.text: Good price and good color. I have done yoga for years and never used the blocks but now I am taking a back yoga class where we lie on our backs and elevate our hips on the block and relax that way for a few minutes. It is an effective and easy to get rid of back pain so I bought my own blocks to use after long car trips. Driving long give me a pain in the back and this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Crowlie

customer_reviews.title: Gives in to your body weight a bit too much.
customer_reviews.text: The blocks give to your body weight more than I would like. I am 150lbs. Other blocks I have used stay much firmer, providing more support for balancing with more stable wrists. I would return these except return shipping would leave me with like a $1 back.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: These blocks add stability and balance to my yoga routine.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you need a little support when exercizing and strtching. Theses blocks add that bit of safety to your workout.
customer_reviews.author: Fisher Girl

customer_reviews.title: Just blocks
customer_reviews.text: I mean nothing spectacular. They're blocks. They're firm and function as they should. No bells or whistles. Just exercise blocks that work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Family shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Blocks for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Love these blocks better then the ones I use in my restorative class. In fact while I am typing this I am sitting on one block comfortably. Feels like a very short solid comfortable purple stool. Some reviewers complained about the smell. I place my nose very close to the blocks and no awful smell. I loved the purple color also. I am sure you will not regret buying them. I know in class some members use 4 blocks. I am thinking about buying another set.
customer_reviews.author: bjjoggs

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, still have them a year later
customer_reviews.text: These matched my mat perfectly. Great size, perfect for my height and ability. Great quality with an even better price.
customer_reviews.author: Caity

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a stroke and he uses them to push and reposition himself up in bed. A friend that teaches yoga suggested using them and they work perfectly. Bought two and left them in the package and they are a good size for him to use.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and soft, but they didn't stand a chance against my teething toddler. Within minutes of unboxing I had tiny little teething bites on the corners of one block. But, they're still useable and that's nothing to fault anyone but myself for. I like how lightweight they are!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Yates

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend for intermediate/advance yogis
customer_reviews.text: Only works for basic poses. Not dense enough for poses that you need to put most body weight on. Don't recommend for intermediate/advance yogis.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Super light, but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Always felt like yoga blocks should be heavier for better steadiness. However the two REEHUT blocks I received are lighter than the one GAIAM block I had for a long time. Overall, it does the job, pretty steady but a bit shaky from time to time. Material mass wise I really hope they can do better.
customer_reviews.author: George G.

customer_reviews.title: Unusually SMALL
customer_reviews.text: These were unusually small! Maybe they’re for a child??? They also bend under pressure. Not useful for an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is a low quality yoga brick. Very light weight, not very sturdy and can become damaged easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Cheep and effective
customer_reviews.text: These blocks have definitely upgraded my yoga practice - providing stability in inversion and support as I work on my splits. They have a little bit of give - but I suppose doing yoga with hard plastic bricks would be uncomfortable. I love that they come in purple which matches my yoga mat. I’m considering getting a se

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive-
customer_reviews.text: It says 2 pc set, only received one block and now the my are out of stock can’t order the other for dance class. Update the advertisement to say 1 pc, I found a small section that says one block but again posting states 2pc.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: I lost my yoga blocks so I bought these. Tried to use them in class for the first time today, and they were too thin for my needs. I bought a new set of the thick ones from my studio and wish these could be returned.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs at least 2 pair of yoga blocks
customer_reviews.text: How can yoga blocks be bad. You can use them for everything. Everyone should have more than one pair. My Physical Therapist gave me the best idea. Use them instead of the squatty potty to get a better bowel movement and to help printing when you have pelvic or bladder pain.
customer_reviews.author: birdwatcher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value with the 2-pack. These are slightly firmer than the Gaiam blocks I've used in yoga class. I use them to stand on and am happy that they sink only a little. No lingering chemical smells.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Best value for sure
customer_reviews.text: Best value for sure. These are high quality blocks, even better than the ones at my yoga studio, and cost about half as much as the ones my yoga studio sells. These will be great to enhance and forward my at home practice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard block that hurt my back
customer_reviews.text: This might have worked for some strong muscle used to Yoga person but my poor old back couldn't handle them. I bought a rounded softer roller to put my back on at Amazon. Was my fault. What was I thinking.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Nice yoga blocks, as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: They are as advertised! They are sturdy little blocks and even better? There is no weird smell! They help me with my asanas that I haven't quite got down yet, I am still a very green beginner in yoga. I bought them because they are used in my yoga class and in the videos I follow at home online.
customer_reviews.author: nytmare

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but rips easily
customer_reviews.text: It's a very comfortable block, but it ripped almost immediately. After using it for some basic exercises, I noticed a small crack in the corner. It's still functional but I wanted a durable block.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as described.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, beautiful and very light weight. Im short and disabled so use these with chair yoga. They work perfectly. I would recommend getting the washable zippered covers for them, which are also available here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mya

customer_reviews.title: Strikin' a Pose like Jenny (with a) Block
customer_reviews.text: I resisted buying blocks for a bit thinking, 'I need to move to these positions on my own'. But blocks really help you achieve your full range of motion faster. You can use the long or short length side of the block depending on what you are doing, so you get 2 ranges of motion and you can use the 2 sides to advance your ability to strike a pose. Also, they are helpful for not just poses but assisting with deeper stretches during your before or after workout routine.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Pagano

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a step for our Mastiff! Haha.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I bought this Yoga block as a ‘step’ to help my 150 lb Mastiff climb into the backseat of my Subaru. He just needed a little extra height to put his foot on to pull himself up. It works perfectly, so it is durable and very firm.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lepianka

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this block, it is soft to the touch but firm. I am grateful for the color choice options. It does not slide all over my floor like another I had purchased so I am able to stay balanced. I am glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Should have gotten these so much earlier! Never knew that yoga blocks could make such a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multi-purpose
customer_reviews.text: I use these for so many things. Yoga moves, stretching my neck, elevated push ups. The blocks have just the right amount of squish combined with enough firmness to make you feel secure.
customer_reviews.author: Erika M. Tandy

customer_reviews.title: Good size.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very new to Yoga and decided some blocks would help me out. This 2 pack is perfect. They are nice and sturdy, while still being comfortable to put pressure on. They did have a funky smell when I first took them out of the plastic. But I let them sit out and when I used them a few hours later there was no smell.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M

customer_reviews.title: An unexpected aid for getting up off of the floor.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I use these to help me get up off of my hands and knees. I push off of the yoga blocks instead of pushing off of the floor. It makes getting up much easier. They are very light weight and do not compress.
customer_reviews.author: D Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great. They do just what I need them to.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, standard yoga blocks for a good price. They are just like the ones at the studio, and they do what I need them to do: be blocks. I like the color and texture, and would buy them again. My dog managed to get to one of them, and did sink some teeth in, but they still work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: E. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Good blocks
customer_reviews.text: They're in great condition. They are kind of squishy, but I don't think it's a problem. My fingers sort of make indentations, but it's not lasting. That's how most are. These are dependable. They get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Shaylee

customer_reviews.title: Best bookshelf speaker stands!
customer_reviews.text: I use these as speaker stands for my Polk Audio TSi-100 bookshelf speakers. They're perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Suntoryjim

customer_reviews.title: Made a great rifle block
customer_reviews.text: Cut a V in one each of the short and long side of the block and use at the range to put rifles on paper! Fantastic value (5 $$$). Block cut well and does not absorb moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Leterbuck

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great color
customer_reviews.text: I love my yoga block purchase. These do very well for me at the studio and I have been using them for almost a year or more. Great colors, fast shipping. Overall good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: G.M

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good value!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been doing yoga for a while but never had blocks. I always felt like they were for beginners and I didn’t need them. But lately I learned how they could help further my practice. So I got these. So far, I love them! I use them in various positions and places and they work great! A great value for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are great for the price. They work well for me. My only concern is that they are a bit too soft; in certain poses I don't feel completely comfortable with the stability. I'm keeping them but if I were to do it over I'd spend more for a better-made block.
customer_reviews.author: MCF

customer_reviews.title: great block!
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to finally get a block for yoga and this one is great! I love the color too. I bought the two pack and gave one to my friend so we can use them when we do yoga together :)
customer_reviews.author: aamonkey12

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Reehut!
customer_reviews.text: This was the forst time I had ever used Yoga Blocks..actually the first time I ever took a Yoga class. I bought 2 sets...one set for me and the other for my wife. We both agree that they are graet for stabilizing yourself in the interesting positions they put you through. Thanks Reehut.
customer_reviews.author: JWJJ

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent yoga blocks! Very sturdy. The smallest size is a tad smaller than the size of a standard cork block but these are so sturdy I would definitely recommend for beginners or advance yogis. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Tabat

customer_reviews.title: Only one block was in the box
customer_reviews.text: Missing one block. The block that came is 5 stars but the other block is missing. Can’t find where to say this. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: michelle gordon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I looked and looked at blocks, I am so glad I picked this one! They are sturdy and strong, I am not a tiny girl and they hold me just fine. I would recommend this to anyone, male or female!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality blocks at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These are great yoga blocks at a great price! I do a subscription yoga program from home and needed some blocks and these looked good. I’ve used them quite a few times now and they couldn’t be better. Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy A

customer_reviews.title: Great for speaker stands
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them for Yoga (I'll never will) but they make good stands for my Micca MB42X's! I have seen other users use these for sound isolation and speaker stands so I decided to buy them for the same purpose. Better than spending $160 like some companies charge for speaker stands.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good quality blocks
customer_reviews.text: Great blocks. Very firm but not painful either. Enhances yoga practice by opening up new poses to work towards. Bought in a package with the strap as well, and everything came as expected. Strap is a great length and feels durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good blocks.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, lightweight and flexible. The only drawback is they are not very thick so you really have to be careful with balance. Overall I am satisfied and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My Yoga Room
customer_reviews.text: I saw just one block at Target for the price of two of these. These are just what I needed and serve their purpose as yoga blocks. They really help with those yoga poses as a beginner and even when you start getting more advanced. I love them and and and so happy I added them to my yoga room.
customer_reviews.author: Painted Luna

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, I love them.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use them for yoga but to put my legs elevated so that my back doesn’t hurt. That’s what my acupressure therapist suggested. I also use one of them while driving. I will buy one more set to take to my yoga class, they are confurtable.
customer_reviews.author: Krsna Vani

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga blocks!
customer_reviews.text: These yoga blocks are great! I use them during my yoga sessions. They are comfortable, light weight, study, stable and durable. I do recommend these blocks!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: not very strong
customer_reviews.text: I think the price is mostly for the shipping (even though I have prime). The material is not very strong. On the first day, all the 4 blocks I received have deep cut or dent everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Transformer

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga block
customer_reviews.text: Good value, nice color selections. Overall for a simple item that helps your yoga game this product is a staple. Item arrived on time and matched description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these blocks!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for deepening yoga poses or assisting in other poses that you may have difficulty holding, etc. They work great regardless if you have them vertical or horizontal. I also stand on them to get more used to the handstand position and they do not collapse. Very happy with this purchase! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Weight and strength
customer_reviews.text: Light and dense. Though you can press in into the block, the depression comes back up to normal. They are new at present. Need to check how long they will last with use. Seems like a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shivani

customer_reviews.title: Good yoga blocks
customer_reviews.text: I have not bought yoga blocks before, so have nothing to compare to. But these seem good quality and I was satisfied with the value for the price. Have been using these for several months and have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Blocks
customer_reviews.text: Typical yoga blocks, but they are sturdy. I just started getting back into yoga, and attending classes at a studio. These are the same quality in the studio I attend. I use them one to three times a week and they work well. Thick enough so you are not shaky with poses.
customer_reviews.author: Venus2556

customer_reviews.title: Great for DDPYoga
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and have held up great through my DDPYoga workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Zatopus

customer_reviews.title: High quality.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for yoga. Just the right size. Excellent quality and worth every penny. Don’t settle for a cheap yoga block from another vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Astra

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: The color pink I ordered was maybe a poor choice for my own purposes (they stain easily) but the blocks themselves are lovely! So soft, yet so amazingly supportive. Love this company. Great product, worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: hybridcreature

customer_reviews.title: They're Okay...
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are okay. They suit their purpose, but they're not nearly as sturdy as the manduka yoga blocks at the yoga studio.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great blocks
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are perfect for what I needed to carry out in my yoga routine. Very happy with .this product. Would recommend them to anybody
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Eyelash extension perfect
customer_reviews.text: so if you’re an eyelash tech and need something to lesson the tension on your neck, i recommend. it brings the lashes higher up to you so that fanning is easier on your neck and back
customer_reviews.author: shenell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. I practice yoga in my living room at home. These work perfectly and a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I have some health issues and I am trying yoga to help me get healthier. This block helps me to stay in some poses that are hard for me. Defiantly worth it if you are new to yoga!
customer_reviews.author: S. WELCH

customer_reviews.title: Beats walmart and better quality too
customer_reviews.text: I looked at to blocks at Wal-Mart and at $8/block and rather cheap construction I figured I would check on Amazon. These were less expensive and now that I've got them I can see the quality is twice as well made as well. They've been very helpful in adjusting my hips and loosening my muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny's Daily Living Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and density.
customer_reviews.text: Great to have if you have a dancer or gymnast at home. Very good dansity of the material used. Also looks like our cats love them too, especially to bite on them :). Now we have to hide them from cats.
customer_reviews.author: svkru

product_meta.title: REEHUT Yoga Blocks 1-PC/ 2-PC, High Density EVA Foam Blocks to Support and Deepen Poses, Improve Strength and Aid Balance and Flexibility - Lightweight, Odor Resistant
feature_bullets: Measuring 9"x6"x3", Comes in a set of 2. Use the blocks separately or stacked together, create a range of possibilities for extra height and support.

Made of Durable High Density EVA Foam to provide reliable support even under considerable weight. Slip-resistant surface and Beveled edges provide a safe and comfortable grip. Moisture-proof material is more durable.

Provide support to each pose in your practice, from side angle or seated pose to forward bend and beyond. Perfect for yoga, Pilates, daily exercise, or physical therapy, great for overall balance and flexibility.

Satisfaction: 60-days money back and 18-month replacement.We will offer you best after-sales service if you have any dissatisfaction with our products. Wish all our customers to be satisfied with REEHUT products.
